contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Yugawa |JapaneseName= 湯川村 |settlement_type= Village |MapImage= Yugawa in Fukushima Prefecture.png |Region= [[Tōhoku region|Tōhoku]] |Prefecture= [[Fukushima prefecture|Fukushima]] |District= [[Kawanuma District, Fukushima|Kawanuma District]] |Area_km2= 16.36 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 3,615 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees=37 |LatitudeMinutes=34 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees=139 |LongtitudeMinutes=53 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.vill.yugawa.fukushima.jp/ Village of Yugawa] }} {{Nihongo|'''Yugawa'''|湯川村|Yugawa-mura}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Kawanuma District, Fukushima]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 3,615 and a [[population density]] of 220.97 persons per km². The total area is 16.36 km². ==External links== *[http://www.vill.yugawa.fukushima.jp/ Yugawa official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Villages in Fukushima Prefecture]] {{Fukushima-geo-stub}}
